mapper.select: SELECT member_idx as memberIdx, name, img_url as profileImg FROM member WHERE account = #{account} and password = #{password}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (account, name, password, telegram_link, img_url) VALUES (#{account}, #{name}, #{password}, #{telegram}, #{imgUrl})

INSERT INTO book (book_type, member_idx, reg_date, upd_date, author, book_category, book_publisher, recommend_reason, title, img_url) VALUES (#{bookType}, #{memberIdx}, NOW(), NOW(), #{author}, #{category}, #{publisher}, #{recommendReason}, #{bookTitle}, #{imgUrl})
mapper.select: SELECT b.book_idx as bookIdx, m.member_idx as memberIdx, m.img_url as profileImage, b.book_publisher as bookPublisher, b.author as bookAuthor, b.title as bookTitle, b.book_type as bookType FROM book as b LEFT JOIN member as m ON b.member_idx = m.member_idx WHERE DATE_FORMAT(b.upd_date, '%Y-%m') = "2024-02"

SELECT b.img_url as bookImage, m.img_url as memberImage, b.recommend_reason as recommendReason, count(c.book_idx) as commentCount FROM book as b LEFT JOIN member as m ON b.member_idx = m.member_idx LEFT JOIN comment as c ON b.book_idx = c.book_idx WHERE b.book_idx = #{bookIdx}
SELECT c.contents, m.img_url as memberImage FROM comment as c LEFT JOIN member as m ON c.member_idx = m.member_idx WHERE c.book_idx = #{bookIdx} ORDER BY reg_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment (contents, book_idx, member_idx, reg_date, upd_date) VALUES (#{contents}, #{bookIdx}, #{memberIdx}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE book SET bookType = 3 WHERE bookType = 2
UPDATE book SET bookType = 4 WHERE bookType = 1
UPDATE member SET last_selected_date = NOW() WHERE member_idx = (SELECT member_idx FROM book WHERE book_idx = #{bookIdx})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book_evaluate (book_idx, contents, member_idx, star) VALUES (#{bookIdx}, #{contents}, #{member_idx}, #{star})
mapper.select: SELECT img_url as bookImage, DATE_FORMAT(selected_date, "%Y-%m") as selectedMonth, total_star as totalStar FROM book WHERE book_type = 3 AND DATE_FORMAT(selected_date, "%Y") = #{year} ORDER BY selected_date DESC
